metadata.title: CVE-2020-13575 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the WS-Addressing pluginfunctionality of Genivia gSOAP 2.8.107. A specially crafted SOAP requestcan lead to denial of service. An attacker can send an HTTP request totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gsoap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
